blocks.name: cofc
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include mapping of an operation to an operation for a function and a constant.

blocks.name: diff.cofc.s
diff.cofc.c
diff.cofc.w
df-ofc
blocks.content: Define the function/constant operation map. The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary operation, then ` oFC R ` is the analogous operation on functions and constants. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ofc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cofc(c0), cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cdm(cv(s0)), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ofc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ oFC(c0)=(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà dom(s0)‚Ü¶((s0 ` s2)[c0]s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: ofceq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function/constant operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofceq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cofc(c0), cofc(c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cofc(c0), cofc(c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cv(hs1)))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cv(hs1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpt2eq3dv(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cv(hs1))), cmpt(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpteq2dv(hs2, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  oveq(c0, c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofceq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí oFC(c0)= oFC(c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(oFC(c0), oFC(c1), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs2 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c0]hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs2 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c1]hs1))), c0 = c1)
  mpt2eq3dv(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, (hs2 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c0]hs1)), (hs2 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c1]hs1)), c0 = c1)
  mpteq2dv(hs2, dom(hs0), ((hs0 ` hs2)[c0]hs1), ((hs0 ` hs2)[c1]hs1), c0 = c1)
  oveq(c0, c1, (hs0 ` hs2), hs1)
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs2.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ofcfval
blocks.content: Value of an operation applied to a function and a constant. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c3, co(c4, c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c3, co(c4, c1, c2)), cmpt(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2)), w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cofc(c1), c2, cmpt(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2)), universe, universe, cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cv(hs1))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cofc(c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cv(hs1))))))
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, s0, c1)
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cv(hs1)), cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  dmeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cv(hs1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  fveq1d(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c3, c5))
  fnex(c0, c3, c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, c6))
  elex(c2, c6)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2)), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), c5))
  eqeltrd(cdm(c0), c5, c3, w0)
  mptexg(s0, cdm(c0), c5, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2))
  mpteq12dva(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c2), w0)
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))))
  sylbi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c4), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  pm5.32i(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cdm(c0), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c3), wfn(c0, c3))
  fndm(c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, cdm(c0), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofcfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[oFC(c1)]c2)=(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(c4[c1]c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0 ` s0)= c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[oFC(c1)]c2), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(c4[c1]c2)), (s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2)), w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, oFC(c1), c2, (s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2)), universe, universe, (s0 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` s0)[c1]hs1)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, oFC(c1)=(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà dom(hs0)‚Ü¶((hs0 ` s0)[c1]hs1))))
  df-ofc(hs0, hs1, s0, c1)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(hs0), ((hs0 ` s0)[c1]hs1), dom(c0), ((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  dmeqd(hs0, c0, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  oveq12d((hs0 ` s0), c1, hs1, (c0 ` s0), c2, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  fveq1d(hs0, s0, c0, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  simprr(w0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Fn]c3, c3 ‚àà c5)
  fnex(c0, c3, c5)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c6)
  elex(c2, c6)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2))‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà c5)
  eqeltrd(dom(c0), c5, c3, w0)
  mptexg(s0, dom(c0), c5, ((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2))
  mpteq12dva(s0, dom(c0), ((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2), c3, (c4[c1]c2), w0)
  oveq1d((c0 ` s0), c1, c2, c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  sylbi((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà dom(c0)), (c0 ` s0)= c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3))
  pm5.32i(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0), s0 ‚àà c3)
  eleq2d(s0, dom(c0), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= c3, c0[Fn]c3)
  fndm(c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚Ü¶((c0 ` s0)[c1]c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: ofcval
blocks.content: Evaluate a function/constant operation at a point. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c2, cofc(c3), c4), c0), co(c5, c3, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c5))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(co(c2, cofc(c3), c4), c0), co(c5, c3, c4), co(cfv(c2, c0), c3, c4), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c2, cofc(c3), c4), c0, co(cfv(c2, c0), c3, c4), c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, c4), universe, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cofc(c3), c4), cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, c4))))
  ofcfval(hs0, c2, c3, c4, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c6, c7, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, cfv(c2, c0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  fveq2d(c2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  ovexd(cfv(c2, c0), c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c2, c0), c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(c2, c0), c3, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofcval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c2[oFC(c3)]c4)` c0)=(c5[c3]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[Fn]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c2 ` c0)= c5)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c2[oFC(c3)]c4)` c0), (c5[c3]c4), ((c2 ` c0)[c3]c4), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  fvmptd(hs0, (c2[oFC(c3)]c4), c0, ((c2 ` c0)[c3]c4), c1, ((c2 ` hs0)[c3]c4), universe, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[oFC(c3)]c4)=(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶((c2 ` hs0)[c3]c4)))
  ofcfval(hs0, c2, c3, c4, c1, (c2 ` hs0), c6, c7, w0)
  eqidd((c2 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  oveq1d((c2 ` hs0), c3, c4, (c2 ` c0), ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  fveq2d(c2, hs0, c0, ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  simpr((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), hs0 = c0)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ovexd((c2 ` c0), c3, c4, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  oveq1d((c2 ` c0), c3, c4, c5, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((c2 ` c0)[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: ofcfn
blocks.content: The function operation produces a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcfn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, wfn(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), c3), wfn(cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2)), c3))
  fnmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2)), c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2))
  ovex(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2)))
  fneq1d(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), c3, cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2)), w0)
  ofcfval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofcfn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[oFC(c1)]c2)[Fn]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, (c0[oFC(c1)]c2)[Fn]c3, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((c0 ` hs0)[c1]c2))[Fn]c3)
  fnmpti(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((c0 ` hs0)[c1]c2)), c3, ((c0 ` hs0)[c1]c2))
  ovex((c0 ` hs0), c1, c2)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((c0 ` hs0)[c1]c2)))
  fneq1d((c0[oFC(c1)]c2), c3, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((c0 ` hs0)[c1]c2)), w0)
  ofcfval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (c0 ` hs0), c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd((c0 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: ofcfeqd2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function/constant operation value. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofcfeqd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cofc(c1), c2), co(c0, cofc(c3), c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, c2), co(cv(s1), c3, c2)))
